attributes.action: Begin immediate screening at all UK borders for Ebola
attributes.additional_details: Given the fact the UK hosts one of the world's busiest hub airports, most travellers from West Africa do not come here via a direct flight and that Britain is a major tourist destination, it is now time to screen all those entering the UK for Ebola. Whilst this sounds like a severe measure to take, no other consideration should come before the safety, security and health of the British people.
